author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTHWESTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTHWESTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 8:00 PM MST Sat Oct 04 the center of Priscilla was located near 15.6, -106.7 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...PRISCILLA MOVING SLOWLY NORTHWESTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS OF THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 8:00 PM MST Sat Oct 04 the center of Priscilla was located near 15.6, -106.7 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Priscilla (EP1/EP162025)
